name: TalkWordytoMeAWordoftheDayFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
On Talk Wordy to Me, host Brielle Nickoloff answers requests from listeners who are curious about the origins and historical evolution of words they find interesting.

If you would like to submit your own word that you want Brielle to discuss, or submit an etymological explanation of your own, just go to http://talkwordy2me.com/

This flash briefing was created and is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your own flash briefing, please email contact@witlingo.com. Thanks!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
